flavor: You imbue the weapon with shocking electricity.

magic.label: Electricity (Magic)
magic.level-4-spells: The weapon can cast 1st rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} once per day.
magic.level-6-spells: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} once per day.
magic.level-8-spells: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} once per day each.
magic.level-12-spells: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp}, 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JyT346VmGtRLsDnV]{Lightning Storm} once per day each.
magic.level-16-spells: The weapon can cast 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp}, 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JyT346VmGtRLsDnV]{Lightning Storm}, and 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TDNlDWbYb58Y55Da]{Chain Lightning} once per day each.
magic.level-20-spells: The weapon can cast 7th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp}, 7th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JyT346VmGtRLsDnV]{Lightning Storm} and 9th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TDNlDWbYb58Y55Da]{Chain Lightning} once per day each.

might.label: Electricity (Might)
might.level-8-arc: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the target.
might.level-12-resistance: The electricity damage dealt by this imbued property ignores resistances.
might.level-14-arc: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the target.
might.level-20-weakness: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying electricity damage, the target gains weakness 1 to electricity until the beginning of your next turn.

tech.label: Electricity (Technique)
tech.level-8-arc: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage and persistent electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the target.
tech.level-12-resistance: The electricity damage dealt by this imbued property (including persistent electricity damage) ignores resistances.
tech.level-16-arc: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage and persistent electricity damage to up to four other creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the target.
tech.level-20-magnetized: Creatures suffering persistent electricity damage from this imbued property become magnetized, attracting metal weapons. Strikes with metal weapons gain a +1 circumstance bonus to hit them as long as they have the persistent electricity damage.
